metadata.title: CVE-2023-21874 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Thread Pooling). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.30and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attackerwith network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS3.1 Base Score 2.7 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
